titleStmt.title: A disputation, betweene a hee conny-catcher, and a shee conny-catcher whether a theefe or a whoore, is most hurtfull in cousonage, to the common-wealth. Discouering the secret villanies of alluring strumpets. With the conuersion of an English courtizen, reformed this present yeare, 1592. R.G.
titleStmt.author: Greene, Robert, 1558?-1592.

publicationStmt.publisher: By A. I[effes] for T. G[ubbin] and are to be solde at the west ende of Paules,

notesStmt.note: Printer's and publisher's names from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
